items.question: Can I upgrade my membership type during the year?
items.question_tamil: ஆண்டின் போது எனது உறுப்பினர் வகையை மேம்படுத்த முடியுமா?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your membership at any time by paying the difference in fees.

items.question: Are there volunteer opportunities for members?
items.answer: Absolutely! We encourage member participation in organizing events, teaching, and community outreach.

items.question: What happens if I miss the annual renewal?
items.answer: You have a 60-day grace period after expiration to renew without losing member benefits.

items.question: Can non-Tamil speakers become members?
items.answer: Yes! We welcome anyone interested in learning about and supporting Tamil culture.
